name: Domino Cascade
description:
Entry for https://itch.io/jam/mini-jam-104-cascade

Recommended to play in fullscreen!

Take a short break from daily hustles and relax with this domino stacking game.

No goal, no time limits. Just your imagination - have fun!

Controls:

LMB - place tile

RMB - hold to rotate camera

MMB - hold to move camera

MouseScroll - rotate tile

R - to remove last tile

Space - play / stop simulation.
